Reviews.Content: We ordered this product for use in our conference room as a screen for clients to see what was on my laptop during meetings. We barely had it out of the box before it began to flicker and flutter. When it worked, the color was beautiful, but that was perhaps 50% of the time. Will stick with buying things like this from Costco.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality for the Price
Reviews.Author: Brandon B. Smith
Reviews.Content: I was incredibly impressed that Sceptre included a screwdriver in the assembly kit, which shows they go the extra mile. They also included a glasses wipe to clean the screen (that made me laugh).The speaker quality is not great, but a sound bar or cheap home theater system would easily fix that.

Reviews.Title: Great Price Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Anastasia
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my parents when their TV broke and haven't had any problems. Quality is pretty good for the price!

Reviews.Title: reynaldo thomas
Reviews.Author: reynaldo
Reviews.Content: i got one pixel shortthe speakers are not the best but picture quality is excellent. so overall i love it.

Reviews.Title: Grat option for price, but bad performance
Reviews.Author: Scott Pike "bigreader"
Reviews.Content: It had a great size for around 200 dollar price, pc audio input and inputs for 3 hdmi and composite and component, but it had damaged pixels and then a weird distorted color after 3 attempts at replacement I sent it back.  My advice is try a similarly priced toshiba or Vizio tv instead.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, and then some.
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Likes:Multiple portsScreen QualitySlim DesignCheap PriceEasy Set upINCLUDES:Remote + BatteriesScreen Microfiber wipeCorrect Sized Screw DriverDislikes:Low Quality SpeakersDead Pixel on the ScreenOther Comments: It works very well and I am very happy with my purchase. My TV came right on time, and was exactly as it was described. True, it did have a dead pixel, but it's hardly noticeable and the 30$ insurance Amazon sold me covers it, I just don't have time to send it in at the moment. If it wasn't for my individual pixel issue I would have given it a 5 star, EVEN with the low quality speakers.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Some of the other reviews scared me, but I went ahead and ordered it anyway and I am happy with it. We've had it for a few weeks now in our bedroom and it's perfect. We just need an HDMI cable because the picture is dull, but that's an easy fix. You can  tell it was a little cheaply made when trying to attach it to the stand but we got it in there and now it's fine. Some of the screws were just a little flimsy when trying to get it attached to the stand. Overall it's a great tv for the money. :) I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: julian
Reviews.Content: This is a very great tv for my bedroom. with the HDMI input; my ps3 looks amazing on it. came nicely packaged and with the 1 year warrenty; even sweeter. thank you sceptre.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Travis Sutterley
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my room at the fire station since my old TV took a dive.  I am very happy with this purchase.  Picture quality is great.  The sound could be better,but it is a small room that I have it in and the sound is more then adequate.  Cant beat the quality for this price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Our Short Term Vacation Rental
Reviews.Author: R. Shank
Reviews.Content: When Amazon lowered the price recently, it was time to buy two of these HDTVs for our Short Term Vacation Rentals. We bought the wall mounts that Amazon recommended, and had these mounted in no time. Although they don't get everyday use, our guests love them for the clear picture and amazing definition (1080p) and ease of use. Great product for the cost!

Reviews.Title: thank u very much for the good deal
Reviews.Author: anne daugherty
Reviews.Content: t.y this tv is very sleek fits nicely in my room. I hope to do more ordering in the near future again thanks

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Cancel account
Reviews.Content: Very good TV  I would recommend this to a friend  easy to use  It is a good value for the money

Reviews.Title: love the tv
Reviews.Author: jm
Reviews.Content: hi  love tv  and great picture and sound and great deliverly serivces  everyone looking for a tv buy this tv and it great prices and easy to setup and great tv

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: rachel
Reviews.Content: Great value for a 32 inch tv, however mine didnt come with screws to set the stand up with. Thankfully, I was planning to wall mount it anyways so it wasnt a big deal. The picture looks great, and I've had no problems with it. I would recommend this to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: professorcolon "Bass Fingers"
Reviews.Content: For the price when  I bought it - can't be beat.  Great picture quality.  Would buy another  if  I  needed to.

Reviews.Title: Sold as "New", obviously a returned item - dead pixel in middle of screen
Reviews.Author: C. Stewart "C"
Reviews.Content: Other than the dead pixel, the picture is bright and sharp.  Ran a true 1080p signal from a computer to it and put it through the nVidia setup paces. It would be a good bargain if not for the dead pixel.  Maybe even 4 stars (the internal speakers, as mentioned by other users, are tinny and of poor sound quality).Here's the reason for the 2 starsI bought this item as a gift because of the good price.  When I got home from work and looked at the box I immediately was concerned as the box had obviously been opened and re-sealed with packing tape.  Got the TV stand put together and connected to a DVD player, hoping for the best, only to discover on power up a bright white pixel in the middle of the screen.To Amazon, new means new, not returned defective and resold.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Kelly Cecil
Reviews.Content: We got this TV for a steal! Most 32" tvs we were looking at were close to $300, but this one was $100 cheaper. I kept thinking there is no way it is going to be a good tv, but with all the great reviews I've read I thought I would take a chance. So happy I made this purchase. The quality is there. It really is a great TV!

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: Koa
Reviews.Content: The sound is to soft unless you have great hearing,but the picture and price cant go wrong its great for a guest room only!!!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: C. Perkins "born to read"
Reviews.Content: This was a great price and the picture is sharp and everything works great. Easily fits with the xbox with more plug in available.

Reviews.Title: A review and a request
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased to replace a 17-year-old monstrosity. We don't watch TV much, so we didn't want to spend a lot of money. We are quite pleased with this purchase, except for the TV's sound quality, which is unacceptably tinny. So now we're in the market for some inexpensive speakers. Recommendations would be appreciated and may be helpful to others considering purchasing this model in the future.

Reviews.Title: My new Sceptre X325BV-FHD TV
Reviews.Author: Cocochick
Reviews.Content: I love watching TV, Netflex and DVDs.  Unfortunately, the picture quality is not clear and crisp and the sound is muffled, which is a great disappointment.  Otherwise, it looks great sitting on my stand.  So I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "aquarius15"
Reviews.Content: I already had a 32" Sceptre like this except it is only 720p.  I have had that one for a year, with no problems.  This one is in another room, and looks a little better, and the sound is a little better than my original one.  I would recommend this to anyone.  32 inch is not huge, and works well in my bedrooms.  It works great with just an antennae or with HD cable.  The provided stand works well.  I had bought a swivel mount to mount it to the wall, but found I really didn't need it as I just have it on top of a dresser.  The sound is pretty good, although it can rattle a little if there is a lot of bass at high volume.  Multiple HD connections, as well a an RCA connection and a cable connector.  I have had a Roku box for Netflix, a blue ray DVD player, a cable box, and an indoor antenna hooked up, and all work great.  I have also tried hooking it up to one of my sound systems, and that worked well too, but I didn't really need that much sound in the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV
Reviews.Author: Spruance963
Reviews.Content: A decent 1080 TV for the Price. I would recommend to my friends looking for a no frills tv at a reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: Great 32-inch TV or Computer Monitor if you can grab it for less than $215!
Reviews.Author: Juniorverse1
Reviews.Content: I was lucky enough to snag this TV when the price dropped below $200.  I had been watching the price for awhile and the price jumps all over the place week after week.  At a price around $200, you simply cannot beat this TV at the time of my review.  I am using this in a bedroom as an upgrade from a horrible 22-inch Vizio LCD and I am very happy with the picture quality on this TV.  The built-in sound isn't the best but what can you expect at this price?  I have it hooked up to an inexpensive Sharp HE HTSB600 Audio Sound Bar System (Black) and a VIZIO Co-Star Stream Player With Google TV - VAP430, and couldn't be happier with the setup for this bedroom.This TV would also make a great PC monitor for someone who is in the market for one.  I already use a 42-inch LED TV as my PC monitor, but I gave this TV a try with my PC and the image was just as good.I highly recommend this TV if you can grab it at the right price!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor/TV for the money
Reviews.Author: DogEars
Reviews.Content: It's always tough to jump into technology at this low of a price point for me because I am a firm believer that you usually get what you pay for. In this case, we break the rule because for the money this TV is really nice.I bought this to use it only as a monitor and it's a really nice monitor overall. Color gamut is good enough, no smudging of the pixels. I would use it for doing real work in Photoshop, but for general daily tasks it's great. No dead pixels that I can see, and at 1080p from a distance of a couple of feet is is sharp and clear.A negative is no DVI input, so you are stuck with VGA from the PC. In addition, it's a little on the thick side, but for the $190 I paid can't complain about that much.Highly recommended as a general use monitor if you need a bigger screen for your tasks.

Reviews.Title: Over all good, but could use a little more sound
Reviews.Author: C Ing
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to watch football games in my outdoor living area.  The picture is good and it was super easy to set up, but the sound is a little low for larger open areas.  Considering how much it cost, its more than worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good Value TV
Reviews.Author: B. Perkins "BP"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is perfect.  The sound does leave something to be desired.  There isn't much range in volume.  Great value at $175

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, no motion pixillation
Reviews.Author: happy camper
Reviews.Content: Colors are great, behaves great with my fios remote. My big Tv is a top rated Panasonic, so I have high standards.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Henry "Fan of great stories, and the insights...
Reviews.Content: The television seems well built, comes om an attractive case, set up quickly and easily.  I am using for a PC monitor, via an HDMI an the picture is sharp and clear.  I would recommend this for the price.  I'm not an HDTV aficionado, but this unit is a definite upgrade and a great way to move from a stock computer monitor to a larger screen.  I can't wait to edit some photo's.  I also use the computer to read guitar tablature in Guitar Pro, I already love the way the high resolution monitor allows me to display much more content before I have to scroll.

Reviews.Title: good so far
Reviews.Author: Patricia Parks
Reviews.Content: Good cheap TV. Haven't had any problems with. Good sharp picture for the cost of the TV. In a nutshell get bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Phenomenal Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Kirk A Sharrar
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, especially for the price. I was having a small headache that most companies would disregard but the support from Sceptre was extraordinary. I can't thank them enough. I would definitely do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: C.S. McDonald
Reviews.Content: Couldn't ask for a better TV and price.  Delivery the next day was amazing. It's being used as a computer monitor and makes my husband look very teched out.  Good job!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ceverette
Reviews.Content: The quality of the picture is great! I would purchase this again if needed. The price was also very good. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Monitor is super; pedestal is iffy
Reviews.Author: Byron Hurder
Reviews.Content: The monitor itself is superb; I really like it.  A lot.The pedestal, on the other hand, is a disaster in the making.  Wobbles, shakes, and just doesn't want to support the monitor safely.O.T.O.H. it could easily be my utter inability to decipher the manual's instructions.  Yup, could be that.

Reviews.Title: Not a bargain
Reviews.Author: Hungry Joe
Reviews.Content: Bought this based on the low price and 1080i specs, but it was not what I hoped.PICTURE:  The contrast was harsh and could not be corrected - despite the specs it really didn't look very good.SOUND:  It was as bad as everyone else has described - like a 1960's pocket transistor radio.Within a few days it developed a bad pixel, although I had already realized I didn't want it.RETURN:  Amazon's return system was the best - I would never hesitate to use Amazon for major purchases in the future - simple, direct and fast.I eventually ended up buying the Vizio E321VL through Amazon and I am VERY pleased with it. I don't think the Sceptre was at all worth it.

Reviews.Content: This set was advertised as a 120Hz LCD TV, and only after receiving it discovered it's only a 60Hz.  This is misleading, and not as good of a deal as I thought based on comparable units at only a 60Hz speed.

Best deal I've made yet for home entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: ukrowdy
Reviews.Content: Works fine for the price. The volume seems to stay a little louder than I need it and it doesn't vary much when turned up or down. One speaker seems to have a little rattle noise with high pitch sounds when the volume is only up about half way. The headphone output has a hum that comes through a pair of external speakers I connected. Picture is great though.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality

Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter's room. Very happy with the picture quality. The sound is not the best. That is the only reason I gave it a 4 star. Hooked it up to speakers and am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre TV

Reviews.Content: The Sceptre television has an excellent picture. It is extremely clear.  It is a 1080.  The television was a great price.

Reviews.Title: I returned the TV set -- it had bad audio quality and hum on earphone (amplifier) output, which is a design defect.

Reviews.Content: I returned this TV set.  The sound through it's speakers was very poor, as reported in other reviews, so I tried to add external speakers through an amplifier using thre earphone jack, which is volume-controlled by the remote.  There was a loud, persistent hum/noise on the audio. I reported this to Sceptre Tech Support several times, but they wold not admit it.  I bought a different LCD TV that had no such noise on the earphone output, and it worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture--poor sound
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this TV and decided to take my chances on the sound quality since the unit is for my kids' room. The picture is fine but the sound is pretty poor. Good TV for the price and for the kids room or another small room.

Reviews.Title: TV of just OK
Reviews.Author: P. Cox
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my daughter as a Christmas present.  It was very simple to mount on a corner mount.  Audio is terrible, picture is good.  I ran into something that I have never run into before with any HDMI device, it was completely incompatible with the Toshiba Blu Ray Player I bought at Best Buy on Black Friday.  I know the player worked fine since I swapped it with the one identical to it in my room and the one from my room would not work with it either but her player worked fine on my TV.  So then I figure I might have a bum HDMI port on the TV so I tested my Roku box on his TV and it worked fine.  I ended up swapping the Toshiba Blu Ray player with the one from my other kids room with an LG one and it worked fine.  I am lucky I had more different ones to swap out!  If you are planning to use this TV with a Toshiba device you might want to think again.  This is in my kids room so the audio is good enough, but if you are planning on making this your main TV you should probably think again of play on investing in a good sound system!

Reviews.Content: Great tv for the money, so far. Was as advertised.Picture quality is very good. The sound isn't very good, but for the money no complaints.

Reviews.Content: ... the stand itself seems to be slightly unaligned the T.V. itself is perfectly fine shows great. Nice sound. Great quality.

Reviews.Title: scepter
Reviews.Author: knightowl
Reviews.Content: The product purchased was exactly as discribed. I am well satisfied with this purchase. I would recommend to family and friends

Reviews.Title: Ah yes a new tv
Reviews.Author: JDigity
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased for the bedroom. I missed out on the Black Friday sale price of $139 and paid $179. We are very happy with this tv. I am not crazy about the sound but it is a bedroom tv. We are not planning to watch block buster movies on it. The picture is clear and sometimes so clear it appears as if the person has a fake background behind them lol. I just happen to notice that one day. I was at the perfect angle that you can see that. Overall we loved the price and love the tv.Ok, not so thrilled on the tv anymore. The tv worked for just under a year and then it decided not to work. There was a burning/melting smell and I couldn't figure out where it was coming from. One of the boards must have melted. So, I sent it back to Sceptre to get the tv fixed under warranty. Note: Don't throw your box away because they won't take it for repair without the original box. They will send you one by request if you don't have the original box. The warranty was just about ready to expire by approximately 4 weeks. We did receive the tv back from Sceptre and it was working. Then about 4 weeks later, my girlfriend noticed green lines and sound issues. Well, the tv is dead again. Total junk. I won't spend the $250 or more Sceptre charges to fix it. I can buy a better quality tv with that money. I purchased another brand tv from Dell a year before purchasing this one and I have had no problems at all with that one. Nothing against Amazon because they didn't make it, but as far as Sceptre, shame on them for putting out a crappy product. Boo.

Reviews.Title: great bargain
Reviews.Author: GregLR
Reviews.Content: I've had no problems with this great deal, great picture & better sound than I expected ;-) I definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Getting what you paid for.+ 3 HDMI ports.
Reviews.Author: ThHobbes "ThHobbes"
Reviews.Content: I was able to purchase the Sceptre X325BV-FHD 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV (Black) while on sale @ $219. A week later, another vendor had it on sale for $210. Amazon promptly honored their low price guarantee, issuing a refund for the difference. No muss, no fuss. The TV arrived promptly, so promptly, I was surprised.Set-up was basically plug and play plus the obligatory fiddle and diddle to set picture and sound to what pleases the owner. Connecting my blue-ray player was a snap. My pc had some initial reluctance to play nice via the HDMI connection but soon, resolution and screen fit resolved their minor differences. The 3 HDMI ports are a very definite plus - especially at this price.The picture is sharp and clear - I use over-the-air reception. 1080p HD is true 1080p HD. For OTA people, 480 and below will look like crap no matter the source, pc or OTA. OTA channels will vary by location (I get 80+ detected of which the big 4 + PBS are well represented.) The remote is very, very basic - again emphasis is on getting what you paid for.Sound is basic, although both a local jazz station and a classical world channel, both sound surprisingly good. I'm thinking rock'n'rollers lament the lack of a booming base found on better systems. The headphone connection was a major disappointment. The accompanying buzz makes it unusable. Another reviewer provided the work-around: RCA to Stereo Y-Cable, 2 x RCA Male / 1 x 3.5mm Stereo Female. Note that your headphones may need a volume control, although there may be a way to use set-up manage sound volume, which I have not discovered..For the price - go for it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Seward
Reviews.Content: I bought for Christmas for our bedroom and so far, I really like it.  I didn't give it 5 stars because the picture quality is ok.  I bought a Roku to go with it and I'm in heaven.  May never get our of my bed ;)  It is also set up with my Dish remote so don't have to switch remotes.

Reviews.Title: WOW, it's great!

Reviews.Content: The only reason I bought this TV was for the price.  I didn't even really need one, although the one in my bedroom could really use a retirement.  I was pleasantly surprised by the quality.  WE had bought a non-brand name on sale for the living room at target (which was more $) and the sound was awful, so I was worried, but there was nothing wrong with this one.I would highly recommend this TV for the price!

Reviews.Content: What can I say but GREAT PICTURE, and GREAT SOUND, and for $219 to the door. ShaWing!Word to tha mutha, if your not pushing at least 720P content to this LCD it's not gonna look like a good picture. 1080P content, obviously, looks even better. If your not happy with the picture, make sure you are pushing the right content. I would put it up against any sony that is twice the money.

Reviews.Content: vibrant colors, great picture quality. I would prefer using external speakers for an amazing experience cuz its inbuilt speakers are not so good.Great value for the price

Reviews.Content: Great Price for a full HD video. I suggest taking the savings and getting a cheap sound system because the TV doesn't cut it.

I was nervous buying a brand I had never heard of, but I've been very impressed with the quality of the product.

Reviews.Title: great for the price

Reviews.Content: Very sharp picture, but skin tones seem 'washed out'. The tv is for use in my office, main tv is a Samsung, which has better color. For the price, I am well pleased with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Emery Rudolph
Reviews.Content: I was lucky enough to purchase this TV on black Friday for $179, and what a buy it was. It has excellent picture quality with both broadcast HD and video games. The one flaw I see is the shallow sound control. All TV's I have ever used have great range in their sound level, but this one does not. The lowest level is loud enough to be uncomfortable if you have a sleeping spouse.This is the only flaw I have experienced with the TV, but it is one that may be of enough concern that it should be considered.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working within two days of using it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jmrwiseguy"
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas. initially it worked fine and she watched movies on it the first day. On the second day she turned it on and there were vertical colored lines in the display when hooked through HDMI. I disconnected HDMI, powered off and then after turning back on (HDMI disconnected) I noticed that TV seemed to be running way slow when going through the menu options. When the TV screensaver kicked in there was ghosting (or a video trail) of the screen saver icon that was scrolling across the screen. I found an option to reset TV in the menu and tried that but it didn't help.I called Sceptre support (it took a couple days because nobody answered the tech support line so I left a message twice). On the 2nd day they answered and the technician believed something must be wrong with the main board so I would need to return it. I've shipped it back to Amazon and am awaiting the refund.Before the TV died it did work well and it is too bad it didn't work out. I would not recommend sceptre TVs.

Reviews.Title: As expected, great TV at an unbeatable price

Reviews.Content: The TV works great, every time I look at it I am amazed at the quality given the price Amazon sold it for.

Next time i used the remote to turn it off,  again it comes back on. Have not yet called customer service yet. We bought two of these, the second tv is working fine..

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: This TV definitely meets the standard I expected from reading the description.I easily set it up as a monitor for my laptop and have had no problems with it.
