Reviews.Content: I did not have high expectations for this t.v. as the price was quite inexpensive.  It was intended for a bedroom and we did not need a high quality t.v.  Unfortunately, this t.v. did not even meet my low expectations.  The color and picture were terrible.  Red and green randomly show in the picture, and no adjusting can make it better. It was beyond poor quality.  We returned this the same day.  Do not waste your money.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: Keith Knudson
Reviews.Content: The picture can't be beat. I hooked it up to a sound bar .. and it's like having your own movie theater.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: Phillip Malone
Reviews.Content: Bot this for my sons apartment. Good picture, perfect size for him. Only complaint was the ups man put the box behind my scrubs and didn't leave note on door. Found it a day later, luckily it didn't rain or snow.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PIC. BAD SPEAKERS
Reviews.Author: STEPHEN MARCHETTI
Reviews.Content: THE PICTURE WAS GOOD FOR THE MONEY THE SOUND WAS REALLY BAD. YOU HAVE TO HOOK IT UP TO A SURROUND SOUND OR SIMULAR DEVICE. THE SPEAKERS ARE TRASH, VERY THIN SOUNDING. NEXT TIME I WILL LISTEN TO THE SPEAKERS BETTER.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32 inch TV X325BV Had to be returned
Reviews.Author: lorinda van
Reviews.Content: The TV was easy enough to set up but it had a series of vague vertical bars in the picture.  They were faint and the picture was still viewable but the lines/bars were impossible to ignore and existed whether TV was being viewed or DVDs.  Tech support could not fix it despite good attempts.  I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Overall, great value
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Harms
Reviews.Content: Love this tv. Great for the bedroom. Good picture and sound is good in smaller room, may not be so good in larger room. One con, the remote that came with the tv didn't work I'm delivery. Not too big a deal as I was able to program tv into my universal cable remote without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth the money...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought at a heck of a deal -- $279 w/ free shipping.  It works great as a monitor as well as a TV.  The only con I came up with is the audio --  It absolutely sucks, but for a bedroom TV, I can live with it.  Might eventually get an AV system to run the audio.

Reviews.Title: OK for the money.
Reviews.Author: Ken Hardy
Reviews.Content: The TV is about what I expected. Picture quality is ok. My Toshiba's is better. The sound distorts at about 35 volume setting. Easy to setup and use. For the price it is a good value. Definetly get other speakers or surround sound because of the afore mentioned sound quality.Ken

Reviews.Title: sceptre 32 inch lcd tv
Reviews.Author: ron land
Reviews.Content: very poor sound buzzes at med volume.  picture has pixels at times would not recommend to anybody. sorry i had to give this rating but not a good buy. Ron Land

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV for the price
Reviews.Author: The MJP
Reviews.Content: This TV has exceeded my expectations given what I paid for it.  I bought it for our bedroom.  I have purchased off-brand HDTVs before and I must say this is one of the better ones.  The Sceptre name has been appearing in many consumer review articles as of late, being called a true competitor among the better brands out there.  I would put this TV on par with my Vizio.  I connected it to my Fios box first with component cables and later HDMI cables and the picture quality is phenomenal with either option.  Some reviewers complained about the sound quality, and to them, I'd recommend an HDMI cable which seemed to broaden the audio spectrum, at least with mine.  Perfect for a bedroom television.  The TV looks sleek and modern, and if it didn't say Sceptre on it I'd honestly think it was one of the big name TVs.  I've had this TV for a couple of months and I will update my review if anything worth noting arises.  Well done, Sceptre!

Reviews.Title: Great Price Low Quality
Reviews.Author: Kyle Wilson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to replace our 150 pound big box TV in our master bedroom.  Very excited to get a the LCD model but I could immediately tell the sound quality was much lower than the TV we replaced.  My wife didn't waste much time letting me know and also said the picture quality was worse as well.(colors etc)  For some reason depending on what we are watching it doesn't utilize the entire screen which is annoying.  That being said I don't care and still love it.  I will connect the audio to our stereo and work on fixing the colors & width of the picture.  So glad to have a flat screen!

Reviews.Title: Sound on the TV
Reviews.Author: Marie Penza
Reviews.Content: Picture is good but the sound is very tinny.  Very disappointed with it, will now have to buy speakers to make it sound better.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: bobjdeering
Reviews.Content: Can't beat it for the price. Forget about shopping around if you need a mid size HDTV with 1080p this one will do quite well.

Reviews.Title: Let us see how long it lasts....
Reviews.Author: jason keil
Reviews.Content: That is the real test.  Judging by the parts and assembly; i would be surprised if it lasted 2 years.  A t.v. should last 10 years!  When I received the product the box was damaged and it was clear that is was previously opened.  I attempted to purchase an extended warranty after the fact but only received confusion.  Amazon referred me to the company and the company referred me to Amazon.  Amazon did knock of $45 for the damage and trouble.  Thank you Amazon.Why we have come this far as humans and now someone decides to put speakers BEHIND the t.v.  I will never understand.  Engineering Devolution. The manufacturing of this t.v. is subpar.  The stand is loose so the t.v flops and sways if touched.  It leans to the right and slightly forward due the small cheap plastic base. There were also plastic shavings still dangling from the frame around the glass due to hasty assembly.  Considering the the rear facing speaker design, the tv sound is actually ok despite some of the other comments about the sound. (it is a tv after all, not a home stereo)  The picture and recovery are fine, although I don't know why the 'normal' screen setting makes the picture about 16".  Why can't I watch a normal screen that fills the frame?  I need just one screen setting. (one that captures the entire display and fits the screen wholly.)  So the tv works.  yay.  Hopefully it will continue to work for many years to come......unlike my last "fancy new t.v."

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: Crabby
Reviews.Content: I bought a couple of these. The image quality is great. Setup was easy. The price was awesome. The sound quality is not great, but it is perfectly fine, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Electrics Faulty
Reviews.Author: Shini Andre
Reviews.Content: TV works fine, great picture. Delivery was horrible and the electrics mainly the power cord are faulty and have to be jiggled to turn the tv on since second day of use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great price!
Reviews.Author: Chooch
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on cyber Monday for $180.  Darn good price for a 32" 1080p TV!  Nice looking, and the picture is fantastic.  TV and base are solid.  Good remote and the menu is easy and intuitive (for me anyway).  I've had it for about a month now and no problems, just pure viewing pleasure!  This is a bedroom TV and doesn't get used much though.  If any issues arise I'll edit this review with details.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Pete M Vo
Reviews.Content: For the price the picture is better than expected,  my only complaint is with the sound. The speakers seem really small and the quality is muffled.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Toughkid
Reviews.Content: I'm 13, I Love my new TV I got for Christmas. and now it says I need nine more words.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Poor Sound
Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: This TV arrived promptly to me in good packaging. Set up was a snap, but upon turning on the TV I noticed that the sound wasn't all that I was expecting. I ended up getting speakers as a fix but if don't plan on doing that please note that it sounds as if there is only one speaker on the back on the right hand side. It was not expensive at all so I can't complain, but it was a bummer that it didn't work without extras. Great picture though!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, nice picture, good sound
Reviews.Author: tina marie shandrew
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV for the price. This was purchased so that my teenager could play video games in his bedroom. Nice picture, sound, quality. I would purchase this brand again !

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Rhett
Reviews.Content: Excellent Quality -- Very pleased with this special deal. Picture quality great - setup easy. Sound not the best but ok.

Reviews.Title: It beats my expectations!
Reviews.Author: Katalina
Reviews.Content: After reading the many reviews (highly positive) about this television, I decided to give it a try. Wow...what a great deal! The picture is fantastic, and the setup was very easy. It's got a built-in 1080 HD tuner, so I was able to "scan" and pick up many, many analog, digital and HD stations (music too) directly from our cable--without using one of those annoying boxes. Once I figured out how to coordinate my DVD and game players with it, it's been flawless. The swivel base is very convenient too.  The only thing I could recommend is a little improvement with the speakers, but that's pretty minor, and I can always add external speakers if I want to. I know Sceptre is a pretty obscure name (compared with the more prominent ones on the market), but the quality of the picture, and all its 'bells and whistles' it makes it an excellent choice for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Mr Dean Dishman
Reviews.Content: Im very pleased with this TV. The picture quality is very good better than my Samsung that I replaced. It is very easy to setup and use and has plenty of inputs for devices. The reason for only 4 stars is for a couple of things. The sound isn't 5 star quality but isnt bad by any means. I dont feel its worth spending anoth $100 for slightly better sound. Secondly, the USB input does not allow video playback you can only see photos or sound files via USB which left me slightly disappointed. Overall this is a great TV for under $200.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: David Sheurman "Dave S."
Reviews.Content: Been using for a week now and all is wonderful. Didn't need to make any adjustments, picture was great right out of the box and while sound isn't equal to my stereo it's fine for TV. Gave it much thought considering the bad reviews  but for the price thought I'd give it a try. Couldn't be happier with the purchase.  Almost bought another one for compouter but decided I'd rather have 2 smaller monitors.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre TV review
Reviews.Author: sean harris
Reviews.Content: I love the picture quality, it's very nice. The only thing I don't like about it is the base that the TV sits on. It's a plastic base and feels very unstable. I live in military barracks, and i have little room for error and s***  happens sometimes, and i have had people bump into the side of it and the TV just starts swaying back and forth like the base is going to snap in two and the TV is going to smash on the floor. That makes me uneasy about the stability of it. Also the warranty for it says it has to be shipped back in the original packaging so I have to keep the box in my closet just wasting space.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture!
Reviews.Author: John G. Fray
Reviews.Content: This product is being used primarily as the console screen for the families game systems.  Previous system was an old Curtis Mathis television.  The change is amazing!  The graphics in Assassin's Creed and FF XIII are fantastic!  Setup was simple and took all of 15 minutes.  Good product!

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Harry B Kaempf Jr
Reviews.Content: You might have to add brightness to the picture occasionally, but for a $200 TV you can't beat it! Would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Happily surprised
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've never purchased a Sceptre brand product before.  Based on the price and favorable reviews I decided to take a chance and bought two of these as gifts.  After setting them up I am happily surprised with the quality of the tvs.  The picture is fantastic, there are more ports than I'll ever use (the 3 HDMI alone are more than enough for me!), and the menus are easy to use.  The tv feels solid and well-built.  We've only had them up for a day but so far I am more than pleased.

Reviews.Title: Picture OK--Audio POOR
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Reznek
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up; picture is very good but the audio is very poor; will need to purchase a sound bar to obtain quality sound. Also, I called their customer service  number and no one answered; asked to leave a phone number which I did, but never was call back.

Reviews.Title: Worst TV ever Purchased!
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Cameron
Reviews.Content: When the sound is at the 100% level it can hardly be heard.  Picture is very fuzzy.  I have purchased Sceptre in the past but never again.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: wfgthree
Reviews.Content: Received item damaged and returned! Turned tv on and the screen was all colored lines. Tv was of low quality what do do expect for the money I guess!

Reviews.Title: High 1080p
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Pretty good as what I expected. Good quality when connect to PC too, and the sound from tv is clear too

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Erienne Anya
Reviews.Content: I was unsure of the TV because it was a brand I was not familiar with.  However, this TV has exceeded my expectations.  It has beautiful picture quality especially when using the HDMI cable and my laptop.  Only complaint is that the TV could have been made with better quality materials...but for the price it's a steal!

Reviews.Title: Very nice tv
Reviews.Author: Michael Muthig
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture, very functional and under $225 delivered made it a very good value. I really like this TV. This one has 1080p vs. 720p on most similarly priced 32" and I guess more p is better. Also has a nice small footprint in a small room.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable quality!!!!
Reviews.Author: Charles ODonovan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mother as a Christmas present but set it up so I would have no Christmas surprises. It has excellent color, sharpness, brightness and speed response. I hooked my Playstation 3 to it to watch a Blu-ray and I was blown away!!! I am now thinking about buying another one and replacing my screen in my office with one of these!!!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Zoe
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for my mom, the picture quality is great  but audio is pretty cheap, she doesn't care about that cuz she uses a surround system. I fell in love with the TV so I decided to buy one for myself. After using mine it for less than 24 hours the picture went completely black. Fortunately I got a refund.

Reviews.Title: 32" Screptre TV
Reviews.Author: Dina
Reviews.Content: Great quality picture, great price. However, terrible costumer service! Please be aware, you are on your own. Technical support never returned my phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, not sound.
Reviews.Author: dizkong
Reviews.Content: This was one great deal of a TV. I looked around and this one was the cheapest without sacrificing on quality. The speakers in the TV i feel should have just been left out. I bought a 39$ AV imput 2.1 surround and fixed the sound problem by just not using the TV speakers Volume. All in all a great buy 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: jan shelton
Reviews.Content: Plug & play , good safe packaging, everything was in the box,took about ten minutes to set up  , works flawlessley so far. I would easily buy another for a P C monitor for my sight impaired dad.

Reviews.Title: Picture OK, Sound not great
Reviews.Author: Fran Jurcso
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty good but the sound is very tinny.  It is a bedroom TV so is OK for that purpose

Reviews.Title: Great price for features... BUT, received defective unit.
Reviews.Author: Doug H
Reviews.Content: Purchased on a BF deal for a rockin' good price, liked the full HD, feature set and 10w speakers. Unfortunately, it was DOA defective. It would power on, splash the Scepter and go straight to a black screen. No response from either TV or remote control buttons, so it was impossible to get to the initial setup menu (or any menu, for that matter). Called the manufacturer's toll free telephone service number in the product manual, got a machine asking for name, tel # and nature of problem and promising a tech would call back. LOL, still waiting......... Amazon return process and refund was surprisingly fast and easy, my first experience and certainly appreciated.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Dan Devine
Reviews.Content: bought this for the bedroom. Black friday deal. Picture is good and well worth the price. Never heard of Sceptre but I dont notice anything sub par compared to other mainstream brands.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for 179 bucks
Reviews.Author: lbar89
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv on cyber monday and it is great for the money.  Unfortunately, I had to return the first one because there was a dead pixel in the screen followed by a white line.  Amazon overnighted me a new one and the picture is great.  Keep in mind this is not a plasma or led so the picture is not going to be supreme, but for what i paid the tv is well worth it!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. R. Murphy
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Picture quality is wonderful for a $200.00 price tag. Sound is okay, sized for a small bed room.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is just OK but it's a good price performer if it's not the main TV in the house.
Reviews.Author: Fred Saunders
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not as good as the other HD LCD TVs in the house but it's good enough at the price as a secondary TV.

Reviews.Title: 1080 for under $200.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Satrape
Reviews.Content: I got this for just under $170.  For the price, you can't beat it.  Like another reviewer I found that the headphone out created a TON of noise, but I simply did what he did.  I dropped money on a stereo rca out to 1/8 inch female cable.  I plugged my headphone into that and it worked great.  The built in speakers aren't that great, but for the price I think that's expected.  Overall a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: ms.. lady "vds"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to use in my bedroom. I got what I perceived a great deal for it on Cyber Monday. I am not disappointed. Its not fancy but it works for me. Easy to set up and use. Arrived promptly with no damage. This is not for anyone looking for a high end tv.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good tv
Reviews.Author: Scott G. Mccoubrey
Reviews.Content: To be honest, I looked at the reviews for this tv before ordering it and almost decided against  it, but good thing I didn't. For the price, the tv is great, it has a really nice display although the menu screen is pretty poorly done. So far I have had this TV for about a month and haven't had a single problem with it.So to break it down here's how I rate this TV.Pro's¯¯¯¯¯--Great price for the size (and 1080p!)--Display looks really nice, Actually was suprised by the quality(4.5 out of 5... compared to a more pricier name brand like Vizio)--looks really nice too==Comes with all tools and supplies needed to attach the base (very simple)¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯Con's...(Kinda)¯¯¯¯¯-- The menu isn't exactly what you would call "pretty" (but hey it works)-- The sound really isn't that great; however, this tv is really nice for a smaller room tv (What i got it for)-- You will not see as many connections on the back of this tv as you would a more mainstream brand  3 HDMI ports, 1 VGA, 1 USB and Hi-Def() Hook-ups on the left side(when viewing from the front)-- The Headphone jack is a 2.5mm instead of a 3.5mm (con for me because my old Tv hooked up through a 3.5mm)¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯I really don't have anything bad to say about the tv, although the remote it came with is a little.... cheap feeling. TV works great, Try finding a better 32" for the same price!

Reviews.Title: i am in love with my tv
Reviews.Author: Karmit Winer
Reviews.Content: i choose 5 stars for the color it is truly amazing.the only little problem is the volume is to loud for me even if it is on the lowest level but thats a small thing i would recommend it anyone i have it in my bedroom and i am about to hang it.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Screws holes on the back of the TV for the stand were not lined up correctly.  I had trouble connecting this TV to my cable it wouldn't recognize it.  The picture quality is not great.  Also the aspect ratio of the picture is not easy to change/configure.

Reviews.Title: love the oicture
Reviews.Author: CINDAZZLE
Reviews.Content: every once in a while when i turn it on its a snow picture with sound . have to turn on and off a few times, comes back but glad i got warrenty bet i end up using it.

Reviews.Title: Scepter tv.
Reviews.Author: Mary Meister
Reviews.Content: Not spectacular, but certainly worth the price.  Would recommend to others as a bedroom tv.I expect it will suit my needs.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre TV
Reviews.Author: SREN
Reviews.Content: We got this TV to replace the one in our bedroom. It's perfect for a bedroom TV. The picture is very clear and crisp. The sound leaves a bit to be desired though, it's a little "flat".  We hooked it up to an RCA soundbar that comes with wi-fi and Netflix, Hulu, etc... so the sound isn't an issue for us now.

Reviews.Title: stand is awful
Reviews.Author: mb
Reviews.Content: This is a perfectly fine tv for the price. Deep blacks, good color, plenty of ports, though it would be nice if it had an ethernet port. It is generally a fine enough tv for me; maybe not for a film buff, but I don't notice any problem with the picture. But the stand is ridiculous! It tilts the tv forward so that the slightest breeze will knock it over. There is no weight to the stand at all, and the tv is properly mounted at the exact front of the stand, so even if there were weight to the stand, the thing would still be off balance. I called the company, thinking I had done something wrong in putting the stand together. Nope - they said I had done it correctly; it was supposed to lean a little. Really? Why? I would give this tv 4 stars if I was going to wall mount it. But the stand is a joke.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Cody Orcutt
Reviews.Content: This TV is great if you need something basic and not looking for the highest of quality.  Easy to set up.  Good picture, ok sound.  When I first turn it on, I can really notice a degradation in sound quality.  But soon after I start watching something, I get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: gwapogorilla
Reviews.Content: I ordered this set on cyber Monday. Sale price was $179, but opened a Amazon credit account, and got an extra $30 off instantly. The TV showed up in 4 days, and was a cinch to assemble. The picture is amazing, but as otheres stated...sound is a little "tinny". But, it's in my bedroom, so it will do  fine. In fact, I liked it so much I bought a 2nd set for my son's XBOX...it works great too!At the same time, I bought a Sony BDP-S390 Blu-ray Disc Player...the remote for the Sony works on the TV! I didn't even program it. Is Sceptre made by Sony?

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, decent picture, and DON'T FORGET TO SELECT THE PROPER SOURCE
Reviews.Author: Whiskey Mike "wm"
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit because I needed a monitor with a larger view.  My eyesight is failing.I have a Mac mini (the new model) that has HDMI and Thunderbolt video outputs. The monitors that use Thunderbolt are out of my price range. The HDMI to HDMI connection available on this TV/monitor was attractive though. I did not intend using it as a TV (although that may change).I got the TV on time, unpacked it (decently packaged and no damage from UPS) assembled it, hooked up the HDMI cable to computer and the TV and turned it on. It just looked at me, expecting an input.The menu system had the PC connection greyed out. The manual was no help. I hoped it wasn't going to try and run a 1920 x 1080 signal thru the VGA port (and I didn't want to buy the $29 Apple adapter if I could help it. I tried various on hand adapters, no dice.So I emailed Sceptre's tech support. I described the problem. They got back to me in about an hour, an exceptional response I thought. They asked about the HDMI cable, asked if i had tried one of the other HDMI ports, and asked if I had the right source selected.Source?Yes, dummy; source. The upper right button on the remote. I selected HDMI 1 in the source sub menu and it worked immediately.Picture quality was good, although some of the characters seemed to have a coloration to them (which could also be my eyes). I also noted that the dock at the bottom of my screen was running off the bottom of the viewable area. Using the remote (I can learn) I selected the button near the bottom labeled 'Aspect', and ran through the various options available; the dock ended up in its proper place, and red coloration of some characters went away.In summary:  good monitor for the new Mac mini, and excellent tech support / customer support. Excellent.Money well spent, even though Amazon was about $20 higher than other suppliers. I trust Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Horrible sound
Reviews.Author: Gimik
Reviews.Content: Bought this for cyber monday. Delivery was fine.The sound from the speakers is terrible. It's worse than any TV I've ever encountered (including those mini-TVs from decades ago). I figured I'd hook up some computer speakers and be done with it, but the headphone jack hums as if it's not grounded correctly. I ended-up having to bypass the TV sound entirely and go directly from the cable box to the speakers.My friend also ordered the same TV and it has the same loud hum out of the headphone jack as well.The picture is not bad.

Reviews.Title: Epic fail after 6 days
Reviews.Author: Justin I. Genter II
Reviews.Content: PROS: low cost, 1080p for that price, lots of ports available. Seemed like a great deal with those features.CONS: screen suddenly went black on 6th day, came back on with vertical line about 3" from the left edge. Most of the picture was gone (black) and what was left looked like a negative image made of vertical gray lines. As others have mentioned, the sound quality on this TV is comparable to what you get from a cheap alarm clock radio. When it worked, the color seems washed out and dull. I'm not sure if this was due to the defects.OTHER: Amazon's return policy is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Was good for 33 days
Reviews.Author: Norm Smith
Reviews.Content: This HDTV lasted just long enough to become ineligible for Amazon's 30 Day Return/Refund Policy. I had also thrown away it's shipping carton because I have no space left in my garage for it's storage. I had submitted a RMA request to Sceptre a few days ago but I didn't receive their automated system's email delivery so I initiated an online chat via their website's resource. I then requested that the email be resent, which it quickly was. The online support person also asked if I required a box (shipping carton) that they will ship to me. I am relieved that Sceptre not only provides a prepaid UPS shipping label via email but that they will also provide a box for return shipment. I've added a star because of this.I was going to order a Samsung HDTV originally but Samsung has now omitted providing analog audio outputs on their current models. I don't subscribe to Comcast's additional cost digital service so digital audio output cannot be utilized for my desired application.I can only hope that a repair will render this unit as reliable and that the turnaround time is efficient. I'll update this review after I experience the re-delivery of my manufacturer refurbished item.[Addendum] - Sceptre shipped me my refurbished unit in late December of 2012 and it has since been a reliable performer. I am now pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great price, not bad tv!
Reviews.Author: Amelia Reinarts
Reviews.Content: I gave this TV a 4 out of 5 star review because the sound isn't great, but in general it's a great tv. I would reccommend this tv if you're on a budget and want a nice tv. I've had it about 2 months and haven't really had any issues with it. I really like it. I bought it on sale for about $240. I read reviews when it was cheaper but I couldn't find any other 1080p 32 in televisions anywhere else for under $350-$400.All in all, great price. Good tv. I am considering buying a sound bar, but we aren't gamers or huge movie buffs, we just watch tv to watch. It serves us well.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Lester Phipps
Reviews.Content: Bought this at under 200 bucks.  Had to return first one since parts and remote were missing.  They were out of stock, but got one to me as soon as they came in.  Couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Deal
Reviews.Author: Daniel Flucke
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 32 inch 1080p TV for as little money as possible. This fit the bill perfectly for me. I've had it for a couple weeks so far, and it's been fantastic. The picture is clear and bright, sound is much louder than my last tv and fills my apartment's living room at less than 1/3 volume, and the TV's menus are quick and responsive. I especially like the ability to label channels and to skip certain channels (Goodbye home shopping network!), which my previous TV did not have. The other brilliant feature is that all of the inputs are clearly labeled, so it's straightforward to plug in inputs even from the side.I was a little nervous about buying an off-brand TV, but so far it's been great and I'm completely satisfied. I haven't tried using it as a giant computer monitor yet, but my blu-rays look great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price.
Reviews.Author: ao91419
Reviews.Content: Looks great! I was unfamiliar  with the brand but so pleased with the product. I would certainly recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great tv at such an affordable price
Reviews.Author: sandra preston
Reviews.Content: Bought for bedroom.  Great picture and sound.  Only problem is sound does not increase beyond certain point.  I use additional speakers, which eliminate sound problem.  Roommate uses tv and thinks it is great.  Also, nice that base swivels.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: C. Tipton
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about the TV brand.  But the picture is great and easy to attach the sound system as well as dvd player. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: The price was right!
Reviews.Author: Curt Aldridge
Reviews.Content: Good TV for the bedroom, kids, or maybe shop.  Sound is not good.  Bought a sound bar make up for it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Isaac M Kennedy
Reviews.Content: At first i was skeptical about this TV since it isn't one of the major brands, but it turned out to be a great buy. The color is good with alittle adjusting and the resolution is great for a 32 inch. Only gripe i had was that the company accidentally sent me the wrong stand. Even if i had to buy a stand it would still have been a good deal but the company was good about it and is sending me the correct stand now. Besides the minor hiccup in packaging this has been a great experience.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the Price hands down! BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Javar Alexander
Reviews.Content: I received this TV right on time!  I mostly use it for Netflix / Hulu streaming with some Xbox 360 gaming. As far as the picture quality goes, It's amazing! For the price of 200$ you can't go wrong with this buy! Seriously... what are you waiting for!? BUY THIS TV NOW.

Reviews.Title: Septre 32 in TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price, easy installation I hung mine on a wall mount bracket. Easy operation and menus are easy to navagate through. Came on manufacturers box. The resuloution looks great, The only thing is the sound to hear it over other household noise it has to be up over half. small drawback for such a great set for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: You Get More Than You Paid For!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Mckinney
Reviews.Content: Very nice product. This is a slim design but not as slim as an LED, but definitely not as thick as your standard LCD. Picture, Sound, Construction and Features are a definite A+ for a $200 TV. Thanks again, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV! if you need a TV with headphone jack-this is your TV.
Reviews.Author: MP "MP"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV!  We have never ordered a TV through the mail. But we will do it again.  This is a great product, great price and no hassle.  We looked for a TV with a headphone jack- that product is hard to find these days.  They are sacrificing the headphone jack for surround sound or eliminating it.We bought this during the Black Friday Deals.  We got a better price than those who got up to go shopping at 5am.  Yea us!  We did the shopping from the comfort of our home.We also like that the base swivels.  Since it is in a bedroom- it is nice to adjust to view from different angles.

Reviews.Title: Take. My. Money
Reviews.Author: Fred Lopez
Reviews.Content: This is a great model for the price (especially when I goes for sale under $200). Do not let the 60Hz refresh rate fool you, it provides a well-crafted high definition image that holds well regardless of the media being watched (analog/HD console gaming, DVDs, actual tv, etc.). I was also amazed by the power of the speakers, I usually have it around 30 (not even half of the limit) and its audible pretty much anywhere in my apartment. Additionally, it is a power saver. It literally has a "power-saving mode" and it allegedly averages an $11/year electricity consumption.I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre X325BV-FHD 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: eagle
Reviews.Content: Based on reviews here I placed an order to replace my son's 22" Panasonic flat screen.Product shipped from Memphis, TN and was on my front door here in Hawaii in ONE DAY!  That's amazing and a first for me in getting anything in one day, much less a big package such as this.  Very impressed.Now to the product itself ... very nice finish.  Works as advertised.  Great image.  Lots of inputs and output options (3 HDMI, Component, digital audio, USB, etc.  Remote is good size with buttons that are clearly marked.  Onscreen options are clear and make sense.  The manual is easy to read and well laid out.  All options are clearly explained.Only thing that disappointing was the sound ... muffled/muted ... but it's okay, just need to hook up better outboard speakers and we're all set.Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Worth the $$$
Reviews.Author: Jordan McAbee
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for $179 shipped during Cyber Monday deals week, and it's as expected for that price range. Anyone that expects a perfect picture from a 60Hz TV isn't thinking right. The only complaint I have it the sound. It's hard to explain, but it's just not very good. Price-wise, this TV is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great presentation thus far
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I received this item today. The seller was nice enough to put the TV box in an inconspicuous BIG box so prying eyes can just wonder. :) (and so my son wouldn't see his Xmas gift early) I thought that was very nice of them since I checked it as a gift order. Upon opening the big unmarked box, I liked how the TV was all nicely sealed with those plastic strips (one on each side of the box). I opened the TV box and It has a Styrofoam cube on each corner of the TV, making it not being able to rock. Came with a nifty little resealable zip lock bag with booklets and a screwdriver a stuff, including the stand. I just plugged it in real quick to see if it was in good standing upon arrival, goes on,  that is all I will know until Xmas day. But it was beautifully packaged so I would be pretty sure the product would be nice as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Value buy!
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Ambrosier
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model 3 weeks ago for $209.  I have currently mounted it to the wall in my office and absolutely love this TV.  The picture is clear and the colors are above average.  I also have a LG LED 42" TV and I find the picture on this TV to be just a tad lower in quality than my LG.  The sound is tinny as mentioned in others reviews, however if you play around with the equalizer you can have it be average sound at worse.If you can purchase this TV for $210 or less I recommend that you jump on it.Pros:-Cost-Picture-Solid menu options-# of HDMI portsCons-Sound-Glossy screen finish (Some like it, I prefer the matte)

Reviews.Title: awesome tv / awesome price
Reviews.Author: Cptn Greg Sparrow "Greg"
Reviews.Content: just get a pair of desk top speakers to replace the crappy ones that come with the tv. spend like an aditional $20-40 and you still end up saving a ton compared to other tv's.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: AMS2213
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this TV. I needed an inexpensive TV for the bedroom so I grabbed this for $180 Shipped. Knowing that this was not a $500 Samsung I wasn't expecting much. Picture quality is better than expected, sound is decent, and it is attractive enough for a bedroom TV. It gets the job done at a great price. My only complaints are the remote can be flaky at times, and the bezel is a little wavy below the screen.

Reviews.Title: not bad actually
Reviews.Author: Rodney Branco
Reviews.Content: The tv itself works great and the only problem I have is with the sound. Regular tv is ok but watching dvds or using the playstation works the speakers pretty hard. Went and got a sound bar for that and for the price I paid I'm pretty pleased.

Reviews.Title: So far so Good
Reviews.Author: msdz
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons room so he could play on his Xbox 360. So far it has been doing good, I have not heard any complaints from him yet. I bought it for about $198.00. I don't think it is to bad for a 32" LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Blew Up First Day
Reviews.Author: C. Weber "cjw3"
Reviews.Content: Didn't buy it from Amazon but took this TV out of the box, installed the wall bracket, mounted it.  DISH tech was here to make sure it was hooked up properly - when he went to install the cable it arced and fried the terminal. THERE IS NOT SUPPOSE TO BE ANY POWER THERE - but it blew up before we ever got to see a picture. And it scared the (blank) out of the tech as he had NEVER seen anything like that before. So back it goes.  Maybe a failure but don't they test them at the factory?This TV has great reviews on another electronics site.  Thank goodness for easy returns (other than the mileage to and from that I will not see a dime for.  Tried to call SCEPTRE - no one would answer a phone - NO tech service / NO customer service / NOBODY would pick up a phone - left a message that their TV tried to kill the DISH tech and still no reply.Don't think I will try another one of their products.

Reviews.Title: Seriously defective -
Reviews.Author: Durt
Reviews.Content: As soon as I turned the set on, I noticed a dead pixel. I arranged for a replacement, figuring this might be a rare lemon. Now, the set simply shut down & won't power up. I certainly hope I have better luck with the replacement, as I've purchased "cheap" sets in the past & never had one as messed up as this. Also, as noted by another reviewer, the box looked like it had been re-taped. I hope someone isn't simply trying to unload a shipment of defective units. But so far, buyer beware.*update* Replacement set also came in re-taped box and also had a dead pixel. Sorry folks - a green dot in the matrix of a "new" set is not acceptable, however small. Avoid.

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat for the price
Reviews.Author: M.A.
Reviews.Content: I was nervous when purchasing this tv because I wasn't familiar with the brand. I trusted in Amazons return policy and went ahead and bought it when it was $179. When the tv arrived I was pleasantly surprised at how compact and light it was. Everything came in the box and was packed as you'd expect it to be. The stand went on very easily. When I plugged it in and connected it to my OTA signal I quickly scanned for digital channels. Without making any picture adjustments I was very impressed with the picture quality. I wasn't concerned with the sound and frankly I wasn't expected much from a tv of this size. If I want big sound I'll ok up a home theater system. After the channel scan I went through and named all the channels. This was a little time consuming but I have yet come across a tv where this is quick and easy. So far this tv has held up nicely and for the price, can't be beat for a 1080p picture.

Reviews.Title: terrible TV
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: First off, let me mention the one thing this TV has going for it -- the picture is crisp and pretty.Sadly, the speakers in the TV are so low quality they sound like a $10 clock radio. Normally this wouldn't be a problem because I could just connect my speakers via the headphone port. However, the headphone port is not grounded correctly and gives a 60Hz hum constantly over your speakers/headphones.This unit is pretty much worthless, and I wouldn't keep it if the unit only cost $100.I am going to be returning this TV to Amazon. Other people have mentioned this exact problem in their reviews but I figured they just got faulty models. It seems to me this is an ongoing problem, and I wouldn't recommend this TV to anyone unless it was $20.

Reviews.Title: Spare yourself the headache
Reviews.Author: Walter Sr
Reviews.Content: I have to rate this tv a zero! We received the TV Dec 23, 2012 and it worked like a champ! Today (2/14/2014) my son changed the channel, the screen went black and the sound went out. The blue power light is still on but we are not getting a display or sound, We cut the power off and unplugged it for several minutes and tried it again,,,not good,,,SAD Valentine's Day! 20 days past Amazon return date so either way I am going to be out of more money trying to take it to get it fixed. I probably would have gotten more excitement setting 200.00 on fire and watching the color display as it turned to ashes on the driveway.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great Prince!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I use this TV for my bf3 ready gaming computer and it works great! Still can't believe i got a 32" 1080p TV for less than 240 bucks! Will recommend to friends!

Reviews.Title: Love this T.V
Reviews.Author: Cherubiel
Reviews.Content: I had this T.V for a few months now and it works great.the screen is wide,it's perfect for a bedroom,which I have mine in. My room is small so it's a perfect fit. Another reason is good for a smaller room is that the sound is not super loud no matter how loud you turn it up but it still loud enough for you to hear everything. I have no complaints about this t.v. I recommend to people who's looking for a affordable 32 in t.v,I paid 209.00 dollars for a 32 in on amazon,that's a great deal. better than paying 300 to 400 dollars for an LG or Sony 32 in IMO.

Reviews.Title: good cheap tv
Reviews.Author: B. Clark
Reviews.Content: Nothing to say, works as expected, just want to rate it with stars and move on to something else.  So...

Reviews.Title: Do it!
Reviews.Author: Colin Robertson
Reviews.Content: It has one stuck pixel. Nothing to complain about. Ive used it as a monitor for a year now and cant go back to a small screen. Great price great product.

Reviews.Title: Little slow
Reviews.Author: Slugo
Reviews.Content: For the low cost a good value do far but has a little hiccup with audio every once in a while would also like better help line as had a hard time getting the best pixels needed to purchase different connecting cables! Overall if not the main t. V . In you're home then should be fine ! Also kids RESLLY say is great GOR blue ray and play station !

Reviews.Title: More a monitor than TV
Reviews.Author: SpinChin "Spin"
Reviews.Content: But great value as a security monitor ...a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r

Reviews.Title: Decent Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: H. Wolfe
Reviews.Content: I give this only 3 stars, due to the fact that the image is not crystal clear like some other HD TV's I have seen, even on HD channels. Also, the sound is rather soft and tinny. If you want good quality sound, you will want a set of external speakers. However, for the price, I can not really complain. Overall, still a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: SN
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. I can not tell any difference between this tv and my more expensive HD tvs.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: brendan loring
Reviews.Content: You know for a 32 inch tv that only cost 219.99 its a decent tv. The picture is good and the quality isnt bad and neither is the price I enjoy playing games, watching movies and TV on it its a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Cheap TV Price and construction
Reviews.Author: Mark King
Reviews.Content: Broke in 1 week of use.  Screen black won't turn on. Power supply seems to have been faulty. Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Did not work out of the box
Reviews.Author: Tod Schmucker
Reviews.Content: Had ordered TV for son’s Christmas present. When received, the box was in good shape, did not show any shipping trauma. When it was hooked up, it had sound but no picture. It was determined that the LCD back lighting was not working in the LCD. Amazon was great about doing a refund due to the item being out of stock, and not being reordered.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive  32" 1080 HD TV
Reviews.Author: nkrnzm
Reviews.Content: This is an inexpensive TV. Expecting a 5 star product for the money is a little far fetched. The speakers are weak, I bought a sound bar. The picture is O.K.  1080 for the price.... 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great 1080p
Reviews.Author: Wally Koltys
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, multiple hdmi and. Additional ports for dedicated Nintendo wii connections.Pros:  1080p, multiple input connections, USBCons:  USB usage limited

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Canuckster
Reviews.Content: TV works great.Picture is great. Well worth the money.Only down side is not much difference in volume from level 50 to level 100. Works great for our purposes as a TV in the workout room.

Reviews.Title: Weak Color and picture sizing problem
Reviews.Author: Dr C
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to receiving this TV.  I tested it against another 32" TV.  The colors were not vivid and the black was only dark grey.  I tried every picture size adjustment but when the screen was filled, pictures of faces were not of proper perportion.  This was used as unit 2 with a DISH DVR.  Perhaps if it was the unit 1, it might be better.  Other than these problems, it has good options such as 3 hdmi female plugs, etc.  Thank goodness for the Amazon guarantee.  I'm returning this unit and will try a different brand from Amazon.Thanks,  Carl Kennedy, PhD

Reviews.Title: The sound didn't work
Reviews.Author: Lee Adama "Apollo"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this hoping for a good deal. Looking at the reviews it either worked great or it broke right away. I went ahead and unpacked it and hooked it up and the picture looked great. However, I got no sound. Just a large clicking noise. No matter what i did I couldn't get the noise to stop until I turned off the TV. I worked with Sceptre tech support who were very nice and had me try a few things but eventually told me that the TV needed to be replaced. I returned it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great quality product
Reviews.Author: Not Telling
Reviews.Content: I got this tv or my boyfriend last year for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. He spends more time in front of it but I've been told the picture and sound quality is good

Reviews.Title: Sceptre tv
Reviews.Author: m
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty good,would be nice if it had a auto sound control. Placement of buttons on remote control is little culamsy

Reviews.Title: good so far its been 2 and a half weeks
Reviews.Author: Brad Mckinnon
Reviews.Content: I love the TV, I used a 2002 tv before and this is grate. I needed to read the text on my ps3 games and there grate now. I don't mind the sound i use it in my bedroom but i have never got it over 50% volume. my ps1 games on my ps3 are odd looking becouse of the hdmi cable so i play them in my ps2 i bet there is a way of changing the settings but i am new to HDTVS.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: mikegabriel
Reviews.Content: great TV for the price.  I got it from amazon for 199.99 with free shipping and paid tax from some deal of the day website.  the box it came in looked rough and i had my doubts but everything was there and accounted for.  I bought if for my kids room and they love it.  i keep it simple and let them use it with their Wii and dvd player (regular not blueray.)  I knew what i was getting when i bought it.  again, for the price the sound and picture quality is fine.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: First of all, the delivery experience to get this product was a disgrace. The first time it was supposed to be delivered I got a call at 11 PM that it would be delivered by midnight. Long and behold it didn't show up. I call the next day and they say they lost it. After going down to UPS myself they find it..I get home, put the TV up on the mount, set it all up, go to turn it on and it doesn't work!!! I call sceptre and their support is terrible. It sounds like somebody answering a phone in their home. There was no greeting such as "Thank you for calling sceptre" it was "Yes hello?" Terrible product and returned for a refund . DO NOT ORDER!

Reviews.Title: sceptre 32 inch 1080p
Reviews.Author: Faustus Rex
Reviews.Content: High Definition looks good as any, non high definition of little full.  but it gets the job done it was excellent for the price.

Reviews.Title: TV MISSING ALL ACCESSORIES
Reviews.Author: Charlie  R
Reviews.Content: While I can only review what I received, the TV itself looked okay but I couldn't try it, as that was all that was in the box. No plug & cord, remote w/batteries, or manual with warrenty. I have returned it for another of same model. Customer service was easy to work with, for more info, read my packageing review.Sceptre X325BV-FHD 32-Inch 60Hz 1080p LCD HDTV (Black)Second TV had all accessories. TV itself has an okay picture for the price but it isn't high end. I will keep it, for the price and as a second TV in the bedroom it is fine.

Reviews.Title: CRAP... you get what you paid for...
Reviews.Author: FILMCRITIC1987 "semenovdesign dot com"
Reviews.Content: When it comes to electronics, its better to just save up the extra 1 - 2 hundred dollars for the thing you really want.  With the amount of problems audio/video I've had, I regret buying this tv.

Reviews.Title: Awaiting Arrival --- (i have had the same TV in the past)
Reviews.Author: Avid Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I have liked this brand since i heard about them a few months back. They seem to build good quality TV's for a good cheap price. This TV has the 2.5mm, or headphone jack, output for audio/external stereo system. Get a $1 adapter for headphone to a/v then connect to your stereo input. I can't wait to get this TV, it would be a great addition.MORE WILL BE ADDED TO THIS REVIEW COMING AS SOON AS I GET THE TV.Update 5/9/2013Sorry people, this TV was actually "lost in transit" and thus was unable to review it.The reason I am writing now is that a friend of my just purchased the TV and he loves it.--- Positive ---*He uses it for full 1080P gaming and it looks better than the TV I bought.*The quality is very nice when using HDMI, slightly off and stretched using RCA.*Uses very little power, but more than $11 a year as stated... more like $22/year (calculated at their rated usage time and price/KWh)--- Negatives ---*The stand rotates freely and is kind of annoying, it will rotate when walking past it sometimes, that's how loose the turning is (I have a raised house, not directly on foundation).*It came with a screwdriver to assemble the stand, but it's really fragile/cheap.*Stripped a screw helping him set it up using the included screw driver.PLEASE STOP DOWN-RATING THIS POST NOW. THANK YOU :)

Reviews.Title: good price acceptable quality
Reviews.Author: solar fan
Reviews.Content: At first, I tried to return this one because when I connected it to my dish line (second line in my house from dish), the picture quality is horrible. It turns out to be the problem of signal from Dish. the second line can only reach 480p, not using it capability. I changed line, and found the quality is ok. But when you use high quality, the picture only occupies the center part, not all. Even though it is 32 inch TV, it only works as a 28 inch, if you put it in high resolution. Only advantage is the price.

Reviews.Title: Where is it Amazon???
Reviews.Author: Jude Barnes "Jude Barnes"
Reviews.Content: Why has it taken three days for this to get from AZ to IL????  How long to get it to Buffalo, NY??????  Three other orders have already arrived.  I'm confused Amazon...

Reviews.Title: Television Possessed by Devil
Reviews.Author: Cole
Reviews.Content: This product seemed like an amazing set for the price. Lots of features, connections, resolution and good size. But then I noticed the screen. It started to display evil images at first. Then after some time it would only play unholy scenes. Ive tried lots of religous symbols around the set, and a home-made excorcism. It only seemed to make things worse. Ive basically just gotten used to watching horror films, scary movies, etc... It turns itself on, makes gurggly sounds. basically evil incarnate in this inanimate object... But, overall though, the set delivers on quality and price point. Of course, everyone complains about the speakers on TV's but hey, buy a stereo if nice sound is your gig! I would recommend the model to a friend, but not the particular set I purchased. Also, you might have to fiddle with settings to get brightness, and format dialed in nicely.
